Changelog
---------

2.0 - May 24, 2011

* Theme upgraded to Plone 4.0
* New top header image

1.1.1 - Oct 23, 2009

* Default theme logo changes [serg]

1.1 - Sep 07, 2009

* Update templates to Plone 3.3

1.0.1 - Mar 04, 2009

* Fix uinstallation procedure, set default skin to 'Plone Default' [piv]

1.0 - Feb 02, 2009

* Initial release
